spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but wall alignment in the central bathroom/closet area is over-complicated. Window count on the bottom wall is significantly higher than indicated in the plan (5 windows vs. 3 clusters).

structural_fidelity.notes: No text labels and clean background observed. However, the stairs are rendered as an open-stringer floating set whereas the plan shows them enclosed between structural walls. A door was hallucinated at the base of the stairs.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island and bedroom furniture are well placed. The dining table is partially obscured and undersized compared to the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style. Camera is orthographic isometric. Lighting is soft and neutral as requested.

detected_errors.description: Lower exterior wall contains more windows than specified in the 2D floor plan layout.
Hallucinated door at the entrance to the staircase area.
Staircase is missing its structural enclosing wall on the left side as shown in the original blueprint.
